SEARCH
Package ms.logic.status

Class GameStatistics

java.lang.Object
ms.logic.status.GameStatistics
public class GameStatistics extends Object
Tracks and manages game statistics for a Minesweeper game, including mine count, revealed cells, flag placements, and win conditions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameStatistics(int height, int width, int totalMines)
    Constructs a new GameStatistics instance with the given grid dimensions and mine count.
    GameStatistics(GridDimension dimensions, int totalMines)
    Constructs a new GameStatistics instance with the given grid dimensions and mine count.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameStatistics

      public GameStatistics(int height, int width, int totalMines)
      Constructs a new GameStatistics instance with the given grid dimensions and mine count.
      Parameters:
      height - the height of the game grid
      width - the width of the game grid
      totalMines - the total number of mines in the game

    • GameStatistics

      public GameStatistics(GridDimension dimensions, int totalMines)
      Constructs a new GameStatistics instance with the given grid dimensions and mine count.
      Parameters:
      dimensions - the dimensions of the game grid
      totalMines - the total number of mines in the game

  • Method Details

    • incrementRevealed

      public void incrementRevealed()
      Increments the count of revealed cells by 1.

    • incrementRevealed

      public void incrementRevealed(int count)
      Increments the count of revealed cells by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      count - the number of cells to add to the revealed count

    • incrementFlags

      public void incrementFlags()
      Increments the count of placed flags by 1.

    • decrementFlags

      public void decrementFlags()
      Decrements the count of placed flags by 1.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all game statistics to their initial state.

    • getRevealedCount

      public int getRevealedCount()
      Gets the number of revealed cells.
      Returns:
      the count of revealed cells

    • getFlagsPlaced

      public int getFlagsPlaced()
      Gets the number of flags placed by the player.
      Returns:
      the count of placed flags

    • getMinesLeft

      public int getMinesLeft()
      Calculates the number of mines remaining to be flagged.
      Returns:
      the difference between total mines and flags placed

    • getTotalOfNonMineCells

      public int getTotalOfNonMineCells()
      Gets the total number of non-mine cells in the game.
      Returns:
      the total cells minus total mines

    • getUnrevealedCount

      public int getUnrevealedCount()
      Calculates the number of unrevealed cells.
      Returns:
      the difference between total cells and revealed cells

    • isGameWon

      public boolean isGameWon()
      Determines if the game has been won. The game is won when all non-mine cells have been revealed.
      Returns:
      true if all non-mine cells are revealed, false otherwise
